short_summary: Department of National Defence needs to contract for the removal and recycling of wet garbage from the Gagetown Detachment
description: Generally, the Gagetown Detachment is located in Fredericton, the base, training area, and armoury will be serviced by the bidder, The Department of National Defence requires the services of a contractor to remove and recycle the wet garbage from the location stated previously .

full_summary:
### Wet Garbage Removal - Gage, Fred - W6898-240700

#### Tender Information

| Category | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Tender Reference | WS4552148147-Doc4556338835 |
| Amendment Number | 4 |
| Solicitation Number | WS4552148147 |
| Publication Date | May 22, 2024 |
| Tender Closing Date | June 5, 2024 (14:00:00) |
| Amendment Date | May 29, 2024 |
| Expected Contract Start Date | June 21, 2024 |
| Expected Contract End Date | None |
| Tender Status | Expired |

#### Summary

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND), is seeking a contractor to provide wet garbage removal and recycling services for the Defence Base in Gagetown, New Brunswick. This tender call is open to all Canadian companies who meet the bidder requirements.

#### Contract Information

* The contract is valued at an estimate value of $ [VALUE].
* The contract term will be from June 21, 2024 until further notice.
* The contract requires the successful bidder to provide wet garbage removal and recycling services for the Defence Base.

#### Bidding Requirements

* The bidding process is an open and competitive process.
* Responses will be evaluated based on the lowest price.
* Should the tender results be unsuccessful, the contractor may request a debriefing to understand the results.

#### Contractual Requirements

* The contract will be awarded to the bidder with the lowest bid.
* The contract will be administered by the PSPC in collaboration with DND.
* The Contractor will be required to comply with the trade agreements of the Canadian government.

#### Contact Information

* Gerald Thompson, Procurement Analyst
 Phone: (905) 555-1234 ext  124
 Email: [gerald.thompson@pwgc.ca](mailto:gerald.thompson@pwgc.ca)

### Important Dates

* Tender closing date: June 5, 2024
* Expected contract start date: June 21, 2024

Please note that an evaluation committee may contact shortlisted bidders with specific questions or requests for clarification. Note that a bidder must not contact committee to clarify a question after three (3) working days.

Please also note that correlation integrity system should give respondents an evaluation evaluation score rather than solely relying solely on  lowest price.

You have 400 words to respond
